title: Pediatric Clinical Practice Guidelines and Policies, 15E [Storm
description:
TITLE/EDITION Pediatric Clinical Practice Guidelines & Policies, 15th Edition: A Compendium of Evidence-based Research for Pediatric Practice (AAP Policy) 
By: American Academy of Pediatrics 
Series: AAP Policy
Paperback: 1253 pages
Publisher: American Academy of Pediatrics; Fifteenth Edition, None edition (April 8, 2015)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1581109237
ISBN-13: 978-1581109238
NOTE: This is the standalone ebook and may not include access codes that come packaged with the bound book




New 15th Edition! 
Keep up with current practice guidelines and policies from the American Academy of Pediatrics with the latest, most up-to-date edition of this clinical reference classic. This evidence-based decision-making tool for managing common pediatric conditions has been revised and updated for 2014, with the latest clinical practice guidelines for more than 30 conditions, plus every AAP policy statement, clinical report, and technical report through December 2014.

Updated and expanded for 2015 including:

- New pediatric clinical practice guidelines on "The Diagnosis, Management, and Prevention of Bronchiolitis"
- New Periodicity Schedule
- Full text of more than 60 new or revised AAP policies
- More than 30 clinical practice guidelines including Sleep Apnea guideline, as well as ADHD, bronchiolitis, dysplasia of the hip, gastroenteritis, otitis media, urinary tract infection, and more.
- 2015 immunization schedule
